alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 7:53PM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...AREAS OF BLOWING SNOW... .Very gusty southwest winds combined with recent snowfall will create areas of blowing snow and low visibility across southern Campbell County and western parts of Weston County through Sunday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County and the Weston County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow blowing across the roads will create areas of snow packed and slippery conditions. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state. &&
